name: Upload a new user into LinkedIn Matched Audiences from a new deal in Pipedrive CRM
description:
This template regularly checks for new deals in Pipedrive CRM and uses the retrieved information to upload new users into LinkedIn Matched Audiences.

For the best performance, your contacts should have these fields filled out:
1) First name
2) Last name
3) Email

Having the contact associated with company information will also improve match rates on LinkedIn, however it's not mandatory for this template to work.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
